entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Calgary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 8:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.5°C
Wind: SE 20 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
